title: ChestCommand 特殊符号Unicode无法代入
author: 伊藤布哥
txt_content:
要怎嬷做才能把特殊符号代入?
我代入中文可以汉化成功
但是为何特殊符号不行?


######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################
menu-settings:
  name: '&cO&em&aG&b小助手&e????'
  rows: 3
  command: 'menu'
  auto-refresh: 5
  open-action: 'sound: note pling; tell:'
  open-with-item:
    id: 345
    left-click: false
    right-click: true

######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################

gates:
  COMMAND: 'open:tpgate.yml'
  NAME: '&cO&em&aG&b传送服务&e????'
  ID: 431
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
cmdboos:
  COMMAND: 'open:cmdbooks.yml'
  NAME: '&e&l◎ &c(&f指令百科&e????&c) &e&l◎'
  LORE:
    - '&7use your want commands'
  ID: 137
  ENCHANTMENT: durability, 1
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
DepartmentStores:
  COMMAND: 'warp Shopping'
  NAME: '&e&l◎ &c(&f百貨公司&e????&c) &e&l◎'
  LORE:
    - '&7Buy your want!'
  ID: 328
  ENCHANTMENT: durability, 1
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1
SellItem:
  COMMAND: 'givemoney: 222'
  REQUIRED-ITEM: 367, 64
  NAME: '????&c&lRotten Flesh????'
  LORE: 
  - '&a&lSell &c&lRotten Flesh &e64:$222'
  - '&a&l賣 &c&l腐肉 &e64:$222'
  ID: 367
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 1
  
SellItem1:
  COMMAND: 'givemoney: 111'
  REQUIRED-ITEM: 4, 64
  NAME: '&c&lCobble Stone'
  LORE: 
  - '&a&lSell &c&lCobble Stone &e64:111'
  - '&a&l賣 &c&l鵝軟石 &e64:$111'
  ID: 4
  POSITION-X: 6
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
OmGServerInfo-en:
  NAME: '&e&nO&c&nm&a&nG&4 &bServer &cRule - en:'
  LORE:
    - '&4Strictly forbid:'
    - '1.Don‘t Harassment、Fraud Someone、'
    - 'or broken and steal Blocks.'
    - '※ First time Jail 3hr,＋3hr and so forth.'
    - '2.forbid vituperation , Foul mouth,Arrogant.'
    - '※ First time mute 30m ,＋30m and so forth.'
    - '3.forbid down pit straight(can be classified as a trap),'
    - '&7Backfill to the surface for'
    - 'at least five spaces above or fenced.'
    - '※ First time Jail 3hr,＋3hr and so forth.'
  ID: paper
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
OmGServerInfo-tw:
  NAME: '&e&nO&c&nm&a&nG&4 &b伺服器&c規章 - tw:'
  LORE:
    - '&4嚴禁:'
    - '1.嚴禁騷擾、詐騙他人、或破壞他人建築以及偷竊物品，'
    - '※ 初犯刑求監獄3hr，再犯刑求6hr，＋3hr以此類推。'
    - '2.禁止謾罵(含髒話)，嘴臭，嗆聲，自大，自以為。'
    - '※ 初犯刑求禁言30m，再犯刑求60m，＋30m以此類推。'
    - '3.嚴禁往下挖掘面積狹窄的深坑&直坑(可被歸類為陷阱的坑洞)，'
    - '至少要回填至地表5格以上或用柵欄圍住。'
    - '※ 初犯刑求監獄3hr，再犯刑求6hr。＋3hr以此類推。'
  ID: paper
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
mypet-help:
  COMMAND: 'open:petmenu.yml'
  NAME: '&e&lMypet help&e(我的寵物-幫助)'
  ID: 122
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2
  
VIPDonation:

  NAME: '&4[&4&LNEW&4]&bVIP&cDonation'

    - '&9VIPⅣ &e$40 &cUSD'

  POSITION-Y: 3
menu-close-no-commands-no-lore:
  NAME: '&6Close-Menu'
  ID: redstone lamp
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 3

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
CC直接加入Unicode是无效的
请去搬运贴http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-482226-1-1.html
内找到符号代码:并且查看。

replies.author: 伊藤布哥
